title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2574/88 of 17 August 1988 fixing for the 1988/89 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2574/88
of 17 August 1988
fixing for 1988/89 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The threshold price for broken rice is hereby fixed at 312,73 ECU per tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 August 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President  // 572,65   // 760,75   // 836,82   //    //   //   //
